name: Preserve Smoothing
description:
Enhance Figma's corner smoothing on large rounded corners


The problem

Have you ever noticed that Figma's corner smoothing doesn't have much effect on large rounded corners?

This plugin solves the problem by "preserving" the smoothing param that you choose and generating slightly different bezier curves.


Usage

Pick a rectangle with a large corner radius. Make sure "corner smoothing" is not 0%.

Right-click on the rectangle and select "Preserve Smoothing" from the menu.
